title: Edo Queens get N10m for winning NWFL title
body_text:
Sport
Edo Queens get N10m for winning NWFL title
The Nigeria Women Football League has announced that Edo Queens will receive N10 million for winning the Super Six playoff.
Edo Queens won the title with 10 points from 10 games.
Moses Aduku’s side claimed the title for the first time in their history.
Edo Queens will participate in the CAF Women’s Champions league next season.
Runners-up Rivers Angels will receive N5 million, while Bayelsa Queens, who finished third will take home N3 million.
Rivers Angels won the title last season.
